name: Recipe: Jade Parcels
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Jade Parcels.

value.name: Lotus Head
value.desc: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

value.name: Jueyun Chili
value.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

value.name: Cabbage
value.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

value.name: Ham
value.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

value.name: Jade Parcels
value.desc: An exquisite-looking dish. The ham's sweetness is locked inside the fresh vegetables, drizzled with a spicy broth. Delicious is an understatement.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from Xiangling's Story Quest: Act I "Mondtadt Gastronomy Trip"</color>
